scripts.test: bun run -F @easyocrjs/core test && bun run -F @easyocrjs/node test && bun run -F @easyocrjs/web test && bun run -F @easyocrjs/cli test
scripts.build: bun run -F @easyocrjs/core build && bun run -F @easyocrjs/node build && bun run -F @easyocrjs/web build && bun run -F @easyocrjs/cli build
